title: Anyway to change the in game cursor?
body: I just recently got a 40inch 4k monitor for my pc which i love except for when im playing lol. I keep loosing my mouse pointer in team fights because the thing is so tiny. Is there anything i can do to make it bigger or just plane change it?

replies.body: 4K is currently not supported, but some adjustments can be made to keep playing.  You should be able to fix this up by reducing your resolution, allowing your point to reappear.  I hope that helps!
